treatment-md.title: Stygobromus caecilius Holsinger, Ansell & Shafer, 2011, sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: Four new species of the subterranean amphipod genus Stygobromus (Amphipoda: Crangonyctidae) from shallow groundwater habitats on the Coastal Plain and eastern margin of the Piedmont in Maryland and Virginia, USA
